column5: There were some big hairy spiders on holiday......shudder!
yuck...you don't just squish those in a kleenex!
yuck...you don't just squish those in a kleenex!  Exactly!!! Use a SHOVEL!!!!!!

Man when I worked at Weyerhauser these things were everywhere. They love rotten wood stumps  I'm not scared of spiders so no worries.  But these can get about half the size of your hand.  They can jump, and they can also swim  And their bite hurts like a beesting
It isn't the size of the spider you need to worry about it is the hole in the wall he made.   Art
I would have NOPE'D out of there! I am not a fan of spiders and that this is way to big for my liking.
Interesting. So fuzzy yet still not at all cute. Takes a special kind of menace to pull that off.
